name: Platformer Unlock
description:
Platformer Unlock!

In order to complete the level you must make it to the end door with the key to unlock it and complete the level! There are 3 levels total, find all 3 keys!

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Space bar to jump.

The wooden platforms can be jumped through from the bottom, the yellow bricks cannot.

Gems: Blue gems-1point  Green gems-3points  Yellow gems-5points
